Reference version 0.0.0.9000

Authentication

Functions used for authenticating

sf_auth

Log in to Salesforce

Query Functions

Functions used for querying

sf_query

Perform SOQL Query

CRUD Functions

Functions used for create, retrieve, update, and delete records.

sf_create

Create Records

sf_retrieve

Retrieve Records By Id

sf_update

Update Records

sf_upsert

Upsert Records

sf_delete

Delete Records

Salesforce Org Utility Functions

Functions used for basic calls to understand the org.

sf_user_info

Return Current User Info

sf_server_timestamp

Salesforce Server Timestamp

sf_list_rest_api_versions

List REST API Versions

sf_list_resources

List the Resources for an API

sf_list_api_limits

List the Limits for an API

sf_list_objects

List Organization Objects and their Metadata
